description.zh-cn: 位于东南欧、地中海和中欧交会处的单一议会共和制国家。1991年宣布自南斯拉夫独立。
description.en: A unitary parliamentary republic at the crossroads of Central and Southeast Europe and the Mediterranean. It declared independence from Yugoslavia in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚政治人物，担任克罗地亚总统。
description.en: Croatian politician, serving as the President of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚政治人物，担任克罗地亚总理。
description.en: Croatian politician, serving as the Prime Minister of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚共和国的一院制立法机关。
description.en: The unicameral legislature of the Republic of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚政治人物，担任克罗地亚议会议长。
description.en: Croatian politician, serving as the Speaker of the Croatian Parliament.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚负责处理宪法事务的法院。
description.en: The court responsible for constitutional matters in Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚法学家，担任克罗地亚宪法法院院长。
description.en: Croatian jurist, serving as the President of the Constitutional Court of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚历史上的第一位国王，于925年将两个公国统一为克罗地亚王国。
description.en: The first king of Croatia, who united two duchies into the Kingdom of Croatia in 925.

nodes.id: 克罗埃西亚王国 (中世纪)

zh-cn: 克罗埃西亚王国 (中世纪)

nodes.id: 斐迪南一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

zh-cn: 斐迪南一世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 哈布斯堡王朝的奥地利国王，1527年被克罗地亚议会推选为克罗地亚国王。
description.en: King of Austria from the House of Habsburg, elected as King of Croatia by the Croatian Parliament in 1527.

nodes.id: 克罗埃西亚联合哈布斯堡帝国

zh-cn: 克罗埃西亚联合哈布斯堡帝国

nodes.id: 克罗埃西亚社会主义共和国

zh-cn: 克罗埃西亚社会主义共和国

description.zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国的加盟共和国之一。
description.en: One of the constituent republics of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.

nodes.id: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

zh-cn: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国
南斯拉夫联邦人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 欧洲联盟，一个由欧洲多个国家组成的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: The European Union, a political and economic union of member states that are located primarily in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战中与同盟国对立的军事联盟。
description.en: A military coalition that fought in World War II against the Allies.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间由轴心国在南斯拉夫境内扶植的傀儡政权。
description.en: A puppet state of Nazi Germany and Fascist Italy during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 由约瑟普·布罗兹·铁托领导的第二次世界大战期间在南斯拉夫抵抗轴心国占领的共产党多民族反抗军。
description.en: The communist-led multi-ethnic resistance force against the Axis powers in occupied Yugoslavia during World War II, led by Josip Broz Tito.

description.zh-cn: 1971年在克罗地亚社会主义共和国发生的一场政治运动，旨在争取克罗地亚更大的自治权和民主权利，但最终被南斯拉夫联邦政府镇压。
description.en: A political movement in the Socialist Republic of Croatia in 1971 that sought greater autonomy and democratic rights for Croatia, which was ultimately suppressed by the Yugoslav federal government.

nodes.id: 塞尔维亚克拉伊纳共和国

zh-cn: 塞尔维亚克拉伊纳共和国

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚独立战争期间，克罗地亚境内的塞尔维亚人自行宣布成立的国家，未获国际承认。
description.en: A self-proclaimed state within Croatia, declared during the Croatian War of Independence by local Serbs, which was not internationally recognized.

description.zh-cn: 1995年11月在美国俄亥俄州代顿市达成的和平协议，结束了波斯尼亚战争及克罗地亚独立战争的部分战事。
description.en: A peace agreement reached in Dayton, Ohio, in November 1995, which ended the Bosnian War and parts of the Croatian War of Independence.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲和北美国家为实现防务合作而建立的国际组织。
description.en: An international organization established by European and North American countries for defense cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的国际组织，致力于促进国际合作，维护国际和平与安全。
description.en: An international organization composed of sovereign states, dedicated to promoting international cooperation and maintaining international peace and security.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚政治家，克罗地亚独立后的第一任总统。
description.en: Croatian politician and the first President of Croatia after its independence.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚政治家，曾任克罗地亚总统。
description.en: Croatian politician who served as the President of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚政治家，曾任克罗地亚总理。
description.en: Croatian politician who served as the Prime Minister of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚裔南斯拉夫革命家和政治家，领导南斯拉夫游击队，并成为南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国的最高领导人。
description.en: A Croatian-born Yugoslav revolutionary and statesman, leader of the Yugoslav Partisans and the supreme leader of the Socialist Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚法西斯组织乌斯塔沙的创始人和领导人，二战期间克罗地亚独立国的领导人。
description.en: Founder and leader of the Croatian fascist organization Ustaše and the leader of the Independent State of Croatia during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 由安特·帕韦利奇建立的克罗地亚法西斯、极端民族主义组织。
description.en: A Croatian fascist, ultranationalist organization founded by Ante Pavelić.

relationships.target: 克罗埃西亚王国 (中世纪)

description.zh-cn: 将克罗地亚的两个公国统一为王国，并成为第一位国王。
description.en: United the two Croatian duchies into a kingdom and became its first king.

relationships.source: 斐迪南一世 (神圣罗马帝国)
relationships.target: 克罗埃西亚联合哈布斯堡帝国

description.zh-cn: 面对鄂图曼帝国的威胁，克罗地亚议会推选斐迪南一世为克罗地亚国王，克罗地亚联合哈布斯堡王朝。
description.en: Facing the threat from the Ottoman Empire, the Croatian Parliament elected Ferdinand I as the King of Croatia, uniting Croatia with the Habsburg dynasty.

relationships.source: 克罗埃西亚社会主义共和国
relationships.target: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 以共和国政体加盟南斯拉夫联邦。
description.en: Joined the Yugoslav Federation as a republic.

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚宣布自南斯拉夫联邦独立，随后爆发与反对国家分裂的联邦军之间的战争。
description.en: Croatia declared independence from the Yugoslav Federation, which was followed by a war with the federal army that opposed the secession.

description.zh-cn: 轴心国入侵导致南斯拉夫王国被支解。
description.en: The Axis invasion led to the dismemberment of the Kingdom of Yugoslavia.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国和义大利王国于当地扶持了傀儡政权——克罗埃西亚独立国。
description.en: Nazi Germany and the Kingdom of Italy established a puppet state, the Independent State of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国和义大利王国于当地扶持了傀儡政权——克罗埃西亚独立国。
description.en: Nazi Germany and the Kingdom of Italy established a puppet state, the Independent State of Croatia.

description.zh-cn: 安特·帕韦利奇建立了非法极端民族主义组织——克罗地亚护国军（后改名为“乌斯塔沙”）。
description.en: Ante Pavelić founded the illegal ultranationalist organization, the Croatian Home Guard (later renamed 'Ustaše').

description.zh-cn: 由安特·帕韦利奇领导的法西斯组织乌斯塔沙接掌了独立国的控制权。
description.en: The fascist organization Ustaše, led by Ante Pavelić, took control of the Independent State.

description.zh-cn: 1945年5月8日，人民解放军开进独立国首都萨格勒布，宣布克罗地亚独立国灭亡。
description.en: On May 8, 1945, the People's Liberation Army entered Zagreb, the capital of the Independent State, and declared its demise.

description.zh-cn: 由克罗地亚人约瑟普·布罗兹·铁托所领导的共产党多民族反抗军。
description.en: The multi-ethnic communist resistance army led by the Croat Josip Broz Tito.

relationships.target: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

relationships.source: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 联邦政府以镇压方式处理了要求更大自治权的“克罗地亚之春”运动。
description.en: The federal government suppressed the 'Croatian Spring' movement, which demanded greater autonomy.

relationships.target: 南斯拉夫社会主义联邦共和国

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚于1991年6月25日宣布独立，此举是南斯拉夫解体的一部分。
description.en: Croatia declared independence on June 25, 1991, as part of the breakup of Yugoslavia.

relationships.target: 塞尔维亚克拉伊纳共和国

description.zh-cn: 克罗地亚军队发动“风暴作战”，迅速瓦解了“塞尔维亚克拉伊纳共和国”政权。
description.en: The Croatian army launched 'Operation Storm', which quickly dismantled the 'Republic of Serbian Krajina' regime.

description.zh-cn: 签订《代顿协议》结束了与联邦军在原南斯拉夫其他地区的战事。
description.en: The signing of the Dayton Agreement ended the hostilities with the federal army in other parts of the former Yugoslavia.
